description: Set ball extra variables. The extra variable can be of any type (number, vector, string) and is associated with the index as if stored in an array.

examples.description: Set extra variable at index 1 to 0 for balls in z-coordinate range
Set extra variable at index 5 to vector (90,100,110) for all balls
Set extra variable at index 1 to string 'Fred' for all balls
Set extra variable at index 3 to 1.5 for balls in group 'layer1'

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Ball.set_extra(slot, value) - requires iteration: for b in itasca.ball.list(): b.set_extra(i, value)
